title: Kiruusih koroonah ah gula
licenseNotes: Do not change the text of this work, but you may translate it, adapt it into other forms, and distribute it for non-commercial purposes. You must keep the copyrights and credits for the author and illustrator Weiman Kou.

summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

8.ssn: Translated by Reuben Soso, Gideon Abadiwa & Sarah Wario

9.ssn: Translated by Reuben Soso, Gideon Abadiwa & Sarah Wario

11.ssn: Wunih TOKO ch’alaati jira tah atini huwanoh ani malte aka kiruusih koroonah ah t’iliptu

19.ssn: Kiruusih ini hint’ilipti mala ch’och’owa ini kuni

20.ssn: Baiyah taai. 2m ch’och’owa gudah arah sih jiraachipti

24.ssn: Suniifi woh atini nama taleh k’ufoh/hat’ifatu/nama d’ukuwah d’egertu atini dendeecheh fook’ata:

25.ssn: Maaskih isaaniti kani. Isaani dendeanih ishih kasaati k’ufaanih yoh anamah isaaniti d’iyaatu gaadani.

29.ssn: Ishiini gaafiah d’ukuh hink’abduh, amoh ufuuma gaadi.

30.ssn: Anamah d’ukuh ini isheene  dendeanih hakeeka hind’egersiisanuh, amoh isaani d’ukuh anamah ati hindawarsani

31.ssn: Amaleh, moma daansah goduh marfanooni, malyenani atini himbeechuh kah d’ukuh k’au.

36.ssn: Kartaasih faltih ah/ K’art’aasih ifa baanuni

39.ssn: & even on the outside of your face mask

45.ssn: Akumsuuleh, hanch’ufa nama faiyah hink’amneh dendee nama d’iwih geah…

49.ssn: Amaleh woh atini tokocha wunih tanah sitih  himbeenye tuch’u, amaleh fuula kenkeh tuch’u,

50.ssn: Amaleh dirbuh ishih ufa arah  d’oorganuuni saab’unih afi  had’ah yoh, daad’ih ani sad’aneesi

51.ssn: Kiruusih ini dendeecheh saa fed’eti k’odah ara teesuma

54.ssn: Aka maalifi amaleh atamiini dirbuh ufa gaadanuni tuni hordofaani daansaa?

58.ssn: Fuula kenkeh hintukini. (Yoh fuula anamah d’iwiah.) Woh atini tuch’u, dursah saab’unih ani aka daansah harka d’ik’ad’i.

59.ssn: Wogah aka sirba “Aabah Jeesoh faarsinah”  d’oochah

65.ssn: Woh atini tuch’u, himudamini.  Bisaani umani harka kenkeh d’ik’ad’i hirbah.

66.ssn: Amaleh, woh ishiini dendeesiptu ifa maskih ah hintuk’ini.

68.ssn: Bineesa ch’ach’arak’oh oni maskih kesaati gugurdata mala atini wogah d’eertuh kaayatu.

69.ssn: Maaskih geti mala iniini t’uraau. Guyah tokocha ch’alah  kaayad’i

74.ssn: Anamah t’uut’umah wah ayah bisaani ini d’ik’atanu k’awaatuh

75.ssn: Segeleh nyaanoh anamah atini wulti hindaramini, k’odah yoh wayah bisaani ini d’ik’atanu

76.ssn: Atini dendeecheh fuula kenkeh ch’ik’ileh teetini hintuch’uh woh atini hiikaafi baateleah.

77.ssn: Woh ishiini dendeesiptu ch’ufanah ch’ik’ileh afi hagooda keetini ch’ufi urga harkah.

79.ssn: Amaleh hirba atini gara ifaatih d’uptu

81.ssn: Wogah  t’uut’umah saab’unih ani harka d’ik’ad’i

87.ssn: Barsiisa kana shoomi moma gudah d’ak’abdiafi!

92.ssn: For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com

104.en: Translated by Reuben Soso/Gideon Abadiwa/Sarah Wario
